title: New EU Study and Data Dashboard Reveal the Scale and Structure of Europe’s Gender Investment Gap in Deep Tech [Promoted Content]
summary_full: A new EU-backed study sheds light on the gender gap in investments across Europe, with a particular focus on deep tech — a category of innovation that is central to Europe’s long-term competitiveness, security, and economic resilience.  Deep tech refers to companies built on scientific breakthroughs and advanced engineering, often emerging from research laboratories and universities.
